pageProps.content:
# Turkish Kebab Marinade

For 1.2-1.5kg chicken thighs

## Ingredients

* 1 cup greek yogurt
* 2Tb olive oil
* 2-3Tb lemon juice
* 2tsp tomato sauce
* 1Tb garlic powder
* 1tsp salt
* 1tsp black pepper
* 1tsp red pepper flakes
* 1tsp paprika
* 1.5tsp cumin
* 1/8tsp cinnamon

## Method

## Notes
